event.title: Talk night #5: Server-less mobile apps (Bath)
event.description:
Server-less mobile apps with MBaaS - e.g parse.com, netmera, kii, kinvey.

Mobile backend as a service (MBaaS) is a newish thing that as an mobile app developer focus on the app and let someone else auto gen APIs, libraries, handle scaling and maintenance.

Too go to be true? let's find out.

Agenda:

# Intro - Scott Alexander-Bown

#Overview/What is MBaaS? - James Frost

#Kinvey -brief overview and poke around kinvey dev console - Scott Alexander-Bown

#Parse.com with some real life case studies - Kieran Gutteridge

We're looking for people to share experiences of these type of platforms.
